channel.title: Divine-Reality 24/7 | OldSchool | Castlewars | Economy!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/anim-banner_zps05f30470.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/zeDerpBanner_zps3316a9f9.png[/img]
Youtube Videos!
[url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gMM6Bosl1ck]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gMM6Bosl1ck[/url]
[url=http://divine-reality.net]http://divine-reality.net[/url]
[IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/40players_zpsff57f997.png[/img]
[b] Welcome to Divine-Reality[/b]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/k0rsc3.png[/img]
Why would you choose Divine-Reality?
We have excellent developers who are striving to provide the best quality updates for you. We care about our community, our players and our forums. We strive for an online 24-7, Playable game. With enjoyable content + new updates.
I think you can only judge the server by actually testing it's main core features, like the skilling system we have. The Quests, The amazing Combat.
We offer a great variety of different tasks. Something new to do. We listen to Suggestions and add them if they seem willingly to benefit the server. We have dedicated Developers to keep you happy.
We stride to keep the server as enjoyable for players. We don't want no one bored and leaving us!. We are always thinking of new ways to attract you!
What we have?
A clean 317 Server with features like
Castlewars! ZERO Lag Auth Vote System Great uptime/Fast forums. Highscores! Levelling up system with REWARDS! Pest control with NPCS! Amazing Bosses to choose from Amazing Economy Hunter skill; Slayer System with rewards PK system with Rewards Clipped following + Npc Clipping Dedicated Developers Friendly Owner+Staff Donator Benefits Amazing skills (all work) Quests! Cook Assistant Dragon Slayer Desert Treasure All 3 Magic spells work! Great Prayer system Great Combat + PVM
Great Economy. 8 Quests!
Were closing in on Christmas! Let's do a traditional Event! [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Santa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Snowfloors_zps183fd393.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/ilal8j.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nu0qjl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/auhbb6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2j0kxoi.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/3462d7c.png[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Training2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Training.png[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Godwars.png[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Barrelchest.png[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/donor.png[/img] [IMG]http://i911.photobucket.com/albums/ac319/wtfispk/Pestcontrol.png[/img] [/left][/b]

item.title: Divine-Reality 24/7 | OldSchool | Castlewars | Economy!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“Deception-pkz, post:9, topic:469737”]We average 10 online per day atm!

Some latest bug fixes:
Combat bug has been fixed (With npcs)
Withdraw X and deposit X has been added
A whole new system for barrows Effects + Void effects are been implented. (Similar To RS’S Formulas)[/quote]

All Updates in every form look MUCH better if you do something like this:

Development Key:

SS = Server-sided

CS = Client-sided

Past Updates:

  • Player V.S. N.P.C. Combat removed from the Base. (SS)

  • Server contents packaged. (SS)

  • 40 new folders created in total. (SS)

  • Client class reduced to 184K.B. (SS)

  • Added a recreation of the 289 Revision’s Prayer Tab. (CS)

  • Player to Player Trading has been removed. (SS)

  • Text Method optimized for grammar purposes. (SS)

  • New Debugging methods added. (SS/CS)

  • Player to Player Following has been removed. (SS)

  • All Scroll-Bars have been removed. (CS)

  • Magic Tab cleaned out for the Tzhaar Magic Tab. (CS)

  • Potion and other UseItem Packet content has been removed. (SS)

  • Player Death has been removed. (SS)

This is very handy, and also enables you to go into greater detail of your Updates. Example:

A whole new system for barrows Effects + Void effects are been implented.

TO:

Equipment Effects such as Barrows and Void now use an entirely new system to calculate their formulas. This system will allow each specific set to be MUCH more accurate and efficient than before. None of these are any longer being continuously used in the Server. Void Equipment now adds up properly and gives the correct RuneScape Statistics as well as the hidden factors.

Read full topic
